mapper.select: Select ieda_director_config_seq, create_date, current_deployment, default_yn, director_cpi, director_name, director_port, director_url, director_uuid, director_version, update_date, user_id, user_password From ieda_director_config

Select ieda_director_config_seq, create_date, current_deployment, default_yn, director_cpi, director_name, director_port, director_url, director_uuid, director_version, update_date, user_id, user_password From ieda_director_config Where default_Yn = #{defaultYn}

select ieda_director_config_seq, create_date, current_deployment, default_yn, director_cpi, director_name, director_port, director_url, director_uuid, director_version, update_date, user_id, user_password From ieda_director_config Where ieda_director_config_seq=#{seq}

select ieda_director_config_seq, create_date, current_deployment, default_yn, director_cpi, director_name, director_port, director_url, director_uuid, director_version, update_date, user_id, user_password From ieda_director_config Where director_url=#{directorUrl}
mapper.insert: insert into ieda_director_config ( ieda_director_config_seq, create_date, create_user_id, current_deployment, default_yn, director_cpi, director_name, director_port, director_url, director_uuid, director_version, update_date, update_user_id, user_id, user_password) Values ( #{director.iedaDirectorConfigSeq}, now(), #{director.createUserId}, #{director.currentDeployment}, #{director.defaultYn}, #{director.directorCpi}, #{director.directorName}, #{director.directorPort}, #{director.directorUrl}, #{director.directorUuid}, #{director.directorVersion}, now(), #{director.updateUserId}, #{director.userId}, #{director.userPassword})
mapper.update: Update ieda_director_config Set current_deployment=#{director.currentDeployment}, default_yn=#{director.defaultYn}, director_cpi=#{director.directorCpi}, director_name=#{director.directorName}, director_port=#{director.directorPort}, director_url=#{director.directorUrl}, director_uuid=#{director.directorUuid}, director_version=#{director.directorVersion}, update_date=now(), update_user_id=#{director.updateUserId}, user_id=#{director.userId}, user_password=#{director.userPassword} Where ieda_director_config_seq= #{director.iedaDirectorConfigSeq}
